basics.summary: Highly skilled software developer with over 12 years of experience building 3 Android and desktop web browsers, hundreds of open source projects, performant apps, and web standards.

work.name: Microsoft
highlights: Spearheaded UI framework migration by **coordinating designers, PMs, and engineers in 3 orgs** and multiple teams, doubling rendering performance and saving engineering time across all of Microsoft.
Advised on sharing code with **React Native**, centralizing business logic between the web, **iOS**, & **Android** apps.

Served as **React/TypeScript subject matter expert**—significantly raised standards performance, accessibility, & internationalization standards through mentorship, writing automated tools, giving tech talks, writing articles.
Wrote specifications for new Web App Manifest features as member of the **World Wide Web Consortium**.
Removed 1.5 seconds from repeat loads with **IndexedDB** caching and **CSS** performance improvements.

work.name: Mozilla
work.position: Android Developer Intern & Part-Time Student Worker
highlights: Built and shipped brand new web browser in **Kotlin** to **over 100 million users on Google Play Store**.
Served as a **feature lead for Progressive Web App support**, providing a native feel to **thousands of web apps**.
Coordinated with **Google** and **Intel** developers to add maskable icon support to Firefox and Chrome.
Added Trusted Web Activity support to Firefox for Android, **featured in Chrome Dev Summit 2019 keynote**.

work.name: Google
highlights: Wrote **Java** bytecode rewriter to insert code automatically and remove Android resume memory leaks.

Designed and built **JavaScript** internal tool to analyze millions of Java .dex files. The tool was used to **save 30 KB** in the first week after release and avoid method count limits that would have halted Google Chrome for Android updates.
Shrank app by 29 KB by migrating **Android Java bytecode** compiler tools.
Used streams and **background threads** to handle 180 MB downloads, rendering partial data **7x faster**.

work.name: Yelp
highlights: Built new web search page feature in **Flow**, **React**, and **Redux** displayed to **1 million users monthly**.
Ported **Android** business logic to **Python** package, later turned into independent microservice.

work.name: Centre for Sustainable Food Systems at UBC Farm

projects.name: Big Island Buses
projects.description: Web app to replace Hawai'i paper bus schedules
highlights: Won **Grand Prize in Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaii’s 2nd District**.
Optimized site for mobile **offline** viewing.
Contacted and worked with the **County of Hawai’i** to integrate the app with the island’s bus system.

projects.name: Soil TopARgraphy
highlights: Will be **published on Google Play** in 2019.
Programmed **Android AR** viewer in **Unity** with **C#**, exposed fields to inspector so teammates could quickly manipulate views.
Wrote script to process Mapbox heightmaps to generate Blender 3D model.

projects.name: μzm
highlights: **Finalist, nwHacks 2018** out of 800+ people.
Helped write **Android** app in **Java** to scan NFC badges on exhibits and patrons.
Built backend with **Node.js**/**MongoDB**.

projects.name: CellWall
projects.description: Interactive display made of cell phones
highlights: Working on new **Kotlin Android** app to display data sent from **Node.js** server with **Socket.io** Android client.
Built display using many **Android** devices attached to foam panel.
Wrote **adb** script to change power state using physical Amazon Dash button remote.

awards.title: UBC Work Learn International Undergraduate Reasearch Award
Grand Prize: Congressional App Challenge 2014, Hawaii’s 2nd Congressional District
